00049 class demod_fsk_processor : public processor::base_iq {
00050 public:
00051   typedef boost::shared_ptr<demod_fsk_processor> sptr;
00052   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00053   
00054   class result_data : public processor::result_base {
00055   public:
00056     typedef boost::shared_ptr<result_data> sptr;
00057     typedef std::vector<unsigned char> data_vector_type;
00058     typedef data_vector_type::iterator iterator;
00059     typedef data_vector_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00060 
00061     virtual ~result_data() {}
00062     static sptr make(std::string name,
00063                      ptime  t,
00064                      double fc_Hz,
00065                      double fs_Hz,
00066                      double baud) {
00067       return sptr(new result_data(name, t, fc_Hz, fs_Hz, baud));
00068     }
00069 
00070     double fc_Hz()   const { return fc_Hz_; }
00071     double fs_Hz()   const { return fs_Hz_; }
00072     double baud()    const { return baud_; }
00073 
00074     size_t size() const { return data_vec_.size(); }
00075     const_iterator begin() const { return data_vec_.begin(); }
00076     const_iterator end() const { return data_vec_.end(); }
00077 
00078     void clear() { data_vec_.clear(); }
00079     void push_back(unsigned char b) { data_vec_.push_back(b); }
00080 
00081     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00082       return os
00083         << "# fc[Hz] = " << boost::format("%15.8f") % fc_Hz() << "\n"
00084         << "# fs[Hz] = " << boost::format("%7.3f")  % fs_Hz() << "\n"
00085         << "# baud[Hz] = " << boost::format("%7.0f")  % baud() << "\n"
00086         << "# Time_UTC data ";
00087     }
00088     // f= @(bb) [bb(:,10) bb(:,9) bb(:,8)-160 bb(:,7) bb(:,6) bitshift(bb(:,5),-2) bitshift(bb(:,1),-4), bitand(bb(:,1),15)]
00089 
00090     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00091       os << boost::format("%02X %02X%02X ") % int(data_vec_[0]) % int(data_vec_[1]) % int(data_vec_[2]);
00092       for (const_iterator i(begin()+3); i!=end(); ++i)
00093         os << boost::format("%02X") % int(*i);
00094 
00095       static const char* weekdays[] = {
00096         "___",
00097         "Mon",
00098         "Tue",
00099         "Wed",
00100         "Thu",
00101         "Fri",
00102         "Sat",
00103         "Sun"
00104       };
00105       static const char* time_zones[] = {
00106         "MEZ",
00107         "MESZ"
00108       };
00109 
00110       if (data_vec_[1] == 0 &&
00111           data_vec_[2] == 0 &&
00112           data_vec_[3] == 0) { // time telegram
00113         os <<
00114           boost::format(" T: 20%02d-%02d-%02d (%s) %02d:%02d:%02d %s")
00115           % int(data_vec_[9] & 0x7F)
00116           % int(data_vec_[8] & 0x0F)
00117           % int(data_vec_[7] & 0x1F)
00118           % weekdays[data_vec_[7]>>5]
00119           % int(data_vec_[6] & 0x1F)
00120           % int(data_vec_[5] & 0x3F)
00121           % int(data_vec_[4]>>2)
00122           % time_zones[(data_vec_[6]&0x80) == 0x80];
00123       }
00124       
00125       if (data_vec_[1] == 0xFF &&
00126           data_vec_[2] == 0xFF) {
00127         os << " \'";
00128         std::copy(data_vec_.begin()+3, data_vec_.end(), std::ostream_iterator<char>(os, ""));
00129         os << "\'";
00130       }
00131       return os;
00132     }
00133

00145     
00146     const double     fc_Hz_;
00147     const double     fs_Hz_;
00148     const double     baud_;
00149     data_vector_type data_vec_;
00150   } ;

00152   typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00153   
00154   typedef filter::iir<double, complex_type>         iir_type;
00155   typedef filter::iir_lowpass_1pole<double, double> iir_lp_type;
00156   typedef filter::integrator_modulo<double>         osc_phase_type;
00157 
00158   demod_fsk_processor(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00159     : base_iq(config)
00160     , name_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"))
00161     , fc_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fc_Hz"))
00162     , fs_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fs_Hz"))
00163     , baud_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.baud"))
00164     , is_initialized_(false)
00165     , period_(1)
00166     , sample_counter_(0)
00167     , filter_(401, 0.02*baud_/200.)
00168     , dc_factor_(1)
00169     , osc_phase_mark_(2*M_PI)
00170     , osc_phase_space_(2*M_PI)
00171     , iir_filter_order_(config.get<size_t>("<xmlattr>.filterOrder"))
00172     , iir_mark_(1+iir_filter_order_)
00173     , iir_space_(1+iir_filter_order_)
00174     , iir_strength_(60., 1000.)
00175     , iir_startup_counter_(0)
00176     , early_late_synch_(5)
00177   {}
00178   
00179   virtual ~demod_fsk_processor() {}

00181   double fc_Hz() const { return fc_Hz_; }
00182   double fs_Hz() const { return fs_Hz_; }
00183   double baud()  const { return baud_; }
00184 
00185   void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00186                   const_iterator i0,
00187                   const_iterator i1) {
00188     const double offset_ppb(sp->offset_ppb());
00189     const double offset_Hz(fc_Hz()*offset_ppb*1e-9);
00190 #if 0
00191     std::cout << "process_iq nS=" << std::distance(i0, i1)
00192               << " " << sp->id()
00193               << " " << sp->approx_ptime()
00194               << " " << sp->sample_rate_Hz()
00195               << " " << sp->center_frequency_Hz()
00196               << " " << sp->offset_ppb()
00197               << " length=" << int(std::distance(i0, i1))
00198               << std::endl;
00199 #endif
00200     if (not is_initialized_) {
00201       // measurements per bit
00202       period_ = size_t(0.5+sp->sample_rate_Hz()/baud()/10);
00203 
00204       const double f_shift0_Hz(fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz());
00205       double f_shift_Hz(filter_.shift(f_shift0_Hz/sp->sample_rate_Hz())*sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00206       fc_Hz_ -= f_shift_Hz;
00207 #if 0
00208       std::cout << "SHIFTs ({f_shift0,f_shift,fc}_Hz): " << f_shift0_Hz << " " << f_shift_Hz << " " << fc_Hz() << std::endl;
00209 #endif
00210       // normalized mark frequency
00211       double k_mark ((fc_Hz() - fs_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()) / sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00212       // normalized space frequency
00213       double k_space((fc_Hz() + fs_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()) / sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00214 
00215       // filter +- baud()
00216       filter_.design(401, 2*baud()/sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00217 
00218       // downconversion to 5*baud Hz
00219       dc_factor_ = size_t(0.5+sp->sample_rate_Hz()/(5.*baud()));
00220 
00221       // iir filters for mark and space with cutoff +- fs_Hz
00222       filter::iir_design_lowpass iird(iir_filter_order_);
00223       iird.design(iir_filter_order_, 2.*fs_Hz()/sp->sample_rate_Hz()*dc_factor_);
00224       const filter::iir_design_lowpass::vector_type a(iird.a());
00225       const filter::iir_design_lowpass::vector_type b(iird.b());
00226       iir_mark_.init(a, b);
00227       iir_space_.init(a, b);
00228 
00229       iir_strength_.init(0.25, double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()) / dc_factor_);
00230 
00231       early_late_synch_ = demod::early_late_synch(double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()) / dc_factor_ / baud());
00232 
00233       std::cout << "k_mark,space,period= " << k_mark << " " << k_space << " " << period_ << " " 
00234                 << sp->sample_rate_Hz() << " " 
00235                 << sp->center_frequency_Hz() << " "
00236                 << early_late_synch_.period() << " fc_Hz= " << fc_Hz() << std::endl;
00237 #if 0
00238       std::cout << "a= "; std::copy(a.begin(), a.end(), std::ostream_iterator<double>(std::cout, ", "));
00239       std::cout << std::endl;
00240       std::cout << "b= "; std::copy(b.begin(), b.end(), std::ostream_iterator<double>(std::cout, ", "));
00241       std::cout << std::endl;
00242 #endif
00243       if (not decoder_)
00244         decoder_ = decode::efr::make();
00245 
00246       is_initialized_ = true;
00247     }
00248 
00249     const double fs(double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()) / dc_factor_);
00250     const double f_mark ((fc_Hz() + fs_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()+offset_Hz)/fs);
00251     const double f_space((fc_Hz() - fs_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()+offset_Hz)/fs);
00252     for (const_iterator i(i0); i!=i1; ++i, ++sample_counter_) {
00253       if ((sample_counter_ % dc_factor_) != 0) {
00254         filter_.insert(*i);
00255       } else {
00256         const complex_type sample(filter_.process(*i));
00257         sample_counter_ = 0;
00258         osc_phase_mark_.process (2*M_PI*f_mark);
00259         osc_phase_space_.process(2*M_PI*f_space);
00260         const double sig_mark (std::abs(iir_mark_.process (sample*std::exp(complex_type(0, osc_phase_mark_.get())))));
00261         const double sig_space(std::abs(iir_space_.process(sample*std::exp(complex_type(0, osc_phase_space_.get())))));
00262         if (iir_startup_counter_ < size_t(0.5+3/baud()*fs)) {
00263           iir_strength_.reset(sig_mark + sig_space);
00264           ++iir_startup_counter_;
00265         } else {
00266           iir_strength_.process(sig_mark + sig_space);
00267           early_late_synch_.insert_signal((sig_mark - sig_space)/std::min(1e-10, iir_strength_.get()));
00268 #if 0
00269           std::cout << "S " 
00270                     << sig_mark << " " << sig_space << " "
00271                     << iir_strength_.get() << " "
00272                     << early_late_synch_.current_bit() << " " << early_late_synch_.bit_valid()
00273                     << "\n";
00274 #endif
00275           if (early_late_synch_.bit_valid()) {
00276             decoder_->push_back(not early_late_synch_.current_bit());
00277             if (decoder_->data_ok()) {
00278               // 4 start bytes + data + checksum + end byte
00279               const size_t length(6+decoder_->data().size());
00280               const double dt_sec(-1.5*early_late_synch_.period() / fs);
00281               const time_duration
00282                 dt(0,0,0, boost::int64_t(0.5 + (std::distance(i0, i)/double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()) - 11.*length/baud_ + dt_sec)*time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00283 #if 0              
00284               std::cout << "EFR: len,dt,fs,dt_sec,dt_len_sec = "
00285                         << length << " "
00286                         << std::distance(i0, i)/double(sp->sample_rate_Hz()) << " "
00287                         << fs << " "
00288                         << dt_sec << " "
00289                         << 11.*length/baud_ << " "
00290                         << std::endl;
00291 #endif
00292               result_data::sptr result_data =
00293                 result_data::make(name_ + "_data", sp->approx_ptime()+dt, fc_Hz(), fs_Hz(), baud());
00294               for (decode::efr::data_vector_type::const_iterator i(decoder_->begin()), end(decoder_->end()); i!=end; ++i)
00295                 result_data->push_back(*i);
00296 #if 0
00297               std::cout << "push_back: " << result_data->to_string() << std::endl;
00298 #endif
00299               sp->put_result(result_data);
00300             }
00301           }
00302         }
00303       }
00304     }
00305 
00306   }

00322   size_t            dc_factor_;    // down conversion factor
00323   osc_phase_type    osc_phase_mark_;
00324   osc_phase_type    osc_phase_space_;
00325   size_t            iir_filter_order_;
00326   iir_type          iir_mark_;
00327   iir_type          iir_space_;
00328   iir_lp_type       iir_strength_;

00330   demod::early_late_synch  early_late_synch_;
00331   decode::efr::sptr decoder_;
